metadata.feature_description: Search and retrieve site pages for URL management operations

steps.action: Navigate to SEO > URL Management > TEST URL tab
steps.expected: TEST URL page loads with Page to Test dropdown
steps.actual: TEST URL page loaded successfully with Page to Test dropdown showing '<None Specified>'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Retrieve all pages without search filter

steps.action: Click on Page to Test dropdown to expand it
steps.expected: Dropdown expands showing all available pages
steps.actual: Dropdown expanded showing 35 pages with search box at top. Pages listed include Home, Our Products, Activity Feed, News, Community, etc.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Search pages by title with partial text match

steps.expected: Results filter to show only pages containing 'Workflow'
steps.actual: Search filtered results to 4 pages: Workflow Test Page, Workflow Test Page New, Workflow Publish Test, Workflow Test Page New Approval

steps.action: Click on 'Workflow Test Page' from filtered results
steps.expected: Page is selected and displayed in dropdown
steps.actual: Page selected successfully - dropdown now shows 'Workflow Test Page' and Test URL button becomes enabled

observations: The Site Pages Search feature is implemented as a page picker component within the TEST URL tab
Search is case-insensitive and performs partial text matching on page names
The search results count is displayed at the bottom of the dropdown (e.g., '4 Results', '35 Results')
Pages are organized in a tree structure with expandable nodes for pages with children
